title: GTA+ Event Benefits
headline: GTA+ Event Benefits
subtitle: GTA+ Event Benefits
content:
GTA+ Members get special benefits in Los Santos Drug Wars alongside a reoccurring monthly GTA$500,000. Including:

- The Acid Lab upgrade for the new MTL Brickade 6x6 upon completing all missions in First Dose
- Buckingham Alpha-Z1 Plane
- LSIA Hangar A17 for access to the Smuggler Business
- Exclusive clothing, bonuses, and more

Plus, a special Member-Only 15% bonus on all Shark Cards, which stacks on top of the recent 20-25% increase to all Shark Card GTA$. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for details.
